page.title: 11LANDSCAPE AND BUILDINGS
page.content: HOUSING :A variable mixture of council and private dwellings scattered in small estates throughout a large portion of the area. INFORMATION SERVICES:A public library is situated in the town and is supplemented by a mobile library. A public library is situated at the sea front and is supplemented by a mobile library. LANDSCAPE & BUILDINGS: Many of the buildings in centre of the town are very old, the tower of St Marys Church is 13th/14th cent. and the Old Guildhall is 14th/15th cent.St Nicollas Church in West Looe probably dates back to the 16th cent.and has had a variety of uses including a civic building,a prison besides being a church at present. The Guildhall dates from 1877.other properties are also of a great age.
